en: Double tap to toggle favorite status
Bluetooth is turned off. Please turn on Bluetooth in Settings to use BitChat.
zh-Hans: 蓝牙已关闭。请在“设置”中打开蓝牙以使用 bitchat。

en: BitChat needs Bluetooth permission to connect with nearby devices. Please enable Bluetooth access in Settings.
zh-Hans: bitchat 需要蓝牙权限以连接附近设备。请在“设置”中启用蓝牙访问。

en: This device does not support Bluetooth. BitChat requires Bluetooth to function.
zh-Hans: 此设备不支持蓝牙。bitchat 需要蓝牙才能运行。

en: private messages encrypted with noise protocol
zh-Hans: 私信使用 Noise 协议加密

en: messages relay through peers, going the distance
zh-Hans: 消息通过节点中继，传得更远

en: get notified when your favorite people join
geohash channels to chat with people in nearby regions over decentralized anonymous relays
zh-Hans: 通过去中心化匿名中继的 geohash 频道
使用 @昵称 提醒特定用户

en: works without internet using Bluetooth low energy
zh-Hans: 使用低功耗蓝牙，无需互联网

en: • tap a peer's name to start a DM
• set your nickname by tapping it

zh-Hans: • 点按人员图标打开侧边栏
定期生成新的节点 ID

en: no servers, accounts, or data collection
zh-Hans: 无服务器、账户或数据收集

en: triple-tap logo to instantly clear all data
zh-Hans: 三击徽标立即清除所有数据

en: private message security has not yet been fully audited. do not use for critical situations until this warning disappears.
zh-Hans: 私信安全尚未完全审计。在此警告消失前请勿用于关键场景。

en: Block or list blocked peers. Usage: /block [nickname]
zh-Hans: 屏蔽或列出已屏蔽用户。用法：/block [昵称]

en: cannot block %@: not found or unable to verify identity
zh-Hans: cannot block %@: not found or unable to verify identity

en: blocked %@. you will no longer receive messages from them
zh-Hans: blocked %@. you will no longer receive messages from them

en:
commands:
/msg @name - start private chat
/who - list who's online
/clear - clear messages
/hug @name - send a hug
/slap @name - slap with a trout
/fav @name - add to favorites
/unfav @name - remove from favorites
/block @name - block
/unblock @name - unblock
zh-Hans:
commands:
/msg @name - start private chat
/who - list who's online
/clear - clear messages
/hug @name - send a hug
/slap @name - slap with a trout
/fav @name - add to favorites
/unfav @name - remove from favorites
/block @name - block
/unblock @name - unblock

en: Send someone a warm hug. Usage: /hug <nickname>

zh-Hans: 发送私信。用法：/m <昵称> [消息]

en: Slap someone with a trout. Usage: /slap <nickname>
zh-Hans: 用鳟鱼拍一下。用法：/slap <昵称>
取消屏蔽用户。用法：/unblock <昵称>

en: no one else is online right now
zh-Hans: no one else is online right now

en: compare these fingerprints with %@ using a secure channel.
zh-Hans: 通过安全渠道将这些指纹与 %@ 比较。

en: you have verified this person's identity.
chat with people near you using geohash channels. only a coarse geohash is shared, never exact gps.
zh-Hans: 使用地理哈希频道与附近的人聊天。仅共享粗略 geohash，绝不共享精确 GPS。

en: location permission denied. enable in settings to use location channels.
zh-Hans: 位置权限被拒绝。前往设置启用以使用位置频道。
已在 geohash 聊天中屏蔽 %@

en: cannot send message: user is blocked.
zh-Hans: 无法发送消息：用户已被屏蔽。

en: cannot send message to %@: user is blocked.
zh-Hans: 无法向 %@ 发送消息：用户已被屏蔽。

en: cannot send: not in a location channel
zh-Hans: 无法发送：不在位置频道中

en: Cannot send message to %@ - peer is not reachable via mesh or Nostr.
zh-Hans: 无法向 %@ 发送消息——对端无法通过网状网络或 Nostr 到达。

en: cannot start chat with %@: user is blocked.
zh-Hans: 无法与 %@ 开始聊天：用户已被屏蔽。

en: cannot start chat with %@: mutual favorite required for offline messaging.
zh-Hans: 无法与 %@ 开始聊天：离线消息需要相互收藏。

en: failed to send to location channel

zh-Hans: 已在 geohash 聊天中取消屏蔽 %@
